content:
In Singapore, there are several agencies involved in research related to Ear, Nose and Throat (ENT) conditions:

1. National University of Singapore (NUS)
2. National University Health System (NUHS)
3. Duke-NUS Medical School
4. Singapore General Hospital (SGH)
5. KK Women's and Children's Hospital (KKH)
6. Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A\*STAR)
7. National Healthcare Group (NHG)

These agencies have dedicated departments and research centers working on various aspects of ENT, such as hearing and speech disorders, nasal and sinus conditions, and head and neck tumors. Some of these agencies also collaborate with international partners to conduct joint research projects in the field of ENT.
